title: Dragon fruit Double Trellis method System!  #trellis  #pitaya #dragon_fruit  #dragonfruitfarming

tasks.task: Entering and navigating a tractor or similar agricultural vehicle
subtasks: Approach the tractor and ensure safe entry
Position oneself in the tractor seat
Adjust seat and controls to a comfortable position
Safely exit the tractor after operation

tasks.task: Operating a forklift or similar material handling equipment
subtasks: Move towards the forklift and secure seating
Operate the forklift controls to lift and position objects
Drive the forklift safely within the farm premises
Lower the load and secure it properly
Drive the forklift back to the starting position
Safely exit the forklift

tasks.task: Operating a slashing machine to clear vegetation
subtasks: Mount the slashing machine on a tractor or similar machine
Prepare the slashing machine for operation
Guide the machine through the fields to cut vegetation
Monitor the machine's performance and adjust as necessary
Disengage the machine and secure it for transport

tasks.task: Using a plow to turn the soil
subtasks: Position the plow attachment on a tractor or similar machine
Secure the plow to the tractor and adjust settings
Initiate the plowing operation and monitor depth and direction
Complete the plowing pass and prepare for the next row

tasks.task: Driving a tractor equipped with a sprayer to apply chemicals
subtasks: Operate the sprayer controls to adjust settings
Navigate the tractor through the crop fields to apply chemicals
Monitor spray coverage and adjust machine speed as needed
Check spray patterns for consistency and effectiveness
Ensure the sprayer is off and properly stored before exiting

tasks.task: Operating a harvester to collect crops
subtasks: Direct the harvester into the crop rows
Adjust the harvesting settings as per crop type and maturity
Monitor the harvesting process to prevent damage
Guide the harvester to the collection point and unload grain
Clean the harvester and return it to the storage area

tasks.task: Using a centrifugal separator to process grain
subtasks: Load grain into the separator and activate the machine
Monitor the separator’s operation to ensure optimal performance
Tend to the separator as needed during the process
Collect the separated grain and remove fine particles
Clean and maintain the separator after use

tasks.task: Operating a baler to compress hay or straw into bales
subtasks: Position the baler in the field and attach it to a tractor
Operate the baler controls to begin bale formation
Guide the baler through the hay field to collect material
Monitor the baling process and adjust the machine if necessary
Disengage the baler and unload the bales for storage or transport

tasks.task: Using a rake to prepare hay or straw for baling
subtasks: Attach the rake to a tractor or similar vehicle
Rake the field to collect and arrange material
Straighten and distribute the hay or straw as needed
Remove any debris or unwanted material from the hay
Position the rake for optimal baling efficiency

tasks.task: Operating a boomer to cut and remove residue after harvesting
subtasks: Adjust the boomer blades to the appropriate height
Guide the boomer through the field to cut residue
Monitor the boomer's performance to ensure thorough cutting
Collect the residue and discard or compost it as needed
Position the boomer for subsequent passes if necessary
